summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'SIENA' (bio.tools/siena) | Latent variable modelling and variational inference for scRNA-seq differential expression analysis | 1 - Install Python 3.6 or create a virtual environment (ex: conda environment) with Python 3.6 | 2 - Install version 1.5.0 of the tensorflow library. If you have a Nvidia GPU install instead the tensorflow-gpu library (version 1.5.0). Be sure to have the CUDA Toolkit and cuDNN, if you are going to use tensorflow-gpu. If those two softwares are not installed the GPU will not be used even if you install tensorflow-gpu
summary.name: ext-ZINBayes
